column1: 39,Complete Purchase Flow for Cellphone with Increased Quantity and Checkout,"Navigate to the homepage, add a cellphone to the cart, increase its quantity, and proceed to checkout. Fill out the information, complete the order, and verify the thank you page.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 7: Click on link goToCart -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 9: Fill out the checkout information form and proceed to payment

column2: - Step 1: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'

- Step 9: Enter input value in input FirstName

- Step 15: Enter input value in input Address
- Step 18: Enter input value in input ZipCode

column1: Step 10: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you page#thank-you/{*}'
